question: 破片
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Tear</kanji> off a <kanji>one-sided</kanji> piece. It's only one part, not all the parts. It's a <vocabulary>fragment</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The <ja>破</ja> reading is the one you learned, the <ja>片</ja> reading isn't one you've learned. Just think about how you're tearing off pieces of a <reading>hen</reading> (<ja>へん</ja>), one fragment at a time. Here little chicken, I want another feather from you please. *CAW*
